```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)
#dont write your packages into quarto

fx <- expression(x^2)

df_dx <- D(expr= fx, name = "x")

x <- 3

eval(df_dx)

```

```{r}
pa <- expression(2*(3*a+2)^4-5)

dp_da <- D(expr = pa, name = "a")

a <- 1.2

eval(dp_da)
```

```{r}
ggplot2::ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = species))
```

```{r}
ggplot2::ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = species, y = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = species)) +
  labs(title = "Penguin Flipper Length by Species", x = "Species", y = "length (mm)")
```
